system.requirements:
Red Consecrator Alternative Advance, 600xp
Hatred (Any One)
system.effect: When dealing damage to a foe that the Character has the appropriate Hatred Talent for, the Character inflicts Righteous Fury on a 9 or 10 damage roll.

description.value: When dealing damage to a foe that the Character has the appropriate Hatred Talent for, the Character inflicts Righteous Fury on a 9 or 10 damage roll.
